newsitem.title: ROMANIA: SOCCER-STEAUA BUCHAREST LOSE KEY MEN FOR EURO GAME.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-STEAUA BUCHAREST LOSE KEY MEN FOR EURO GAME.

text.p: Steaua Bucharest will be without three key players for their Champions League group B match against Atheltico Madrid in Spain on Wednesday.
Top scorer Adrian Ilie is banned for three games after being sent off for a foul from behind in the preliminary round against Belgium's champions F.C. Bruge in Bucharest.
Midfielder Iulian Filipescu will also miss the game at Madrid's Vincente Calderon stadium after being banned for receiving two booking in previous matches.
Striker Marius Lacatus is injured with a severe muscle strain and he will be out for at least two weeks.
"The game will be extremely dificult for my team and the three players' absence it's a great handicap for us," Steaua's trainer Dumitru Dumitriu said.
